name: RED TOWER - #456 CLASH WAR
description:
Are you a fan of the famous and bloody TV series Squid Game? Enjoy with the game Red Tower - #456 Clash War a combination of more than 100 different missions where you can choose between powerful wizards, very agile archers, snipers, warriors and many unique characters while you face powerful enemies in bloody melee battles body.

Think carefully about the order in which you must make your attacks to increase your power without taking damage, adding and subtracting points on your scoreboard and improving your resistance to your opponents. Save some hostages from almost certain death, rise to the top of the tower without a single scratch, and prove that you are the only warrior capable of collecting precious loot, killing monsters, and evolving by linking your warrior with others to convert it. in all a legend. Have a good time!
